faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Need more detail? Reach out via email or chat and our team will walk you through the workflow.

items.title: What is included with MACRS Depreciation Calculator?
items.description: You get the full Next.js application with dashboards, asset workflows, Supabase schema, Stripe billing and localization already wired.

items.title: Can non technical teams maintain the tool?
items.description: Yes. Guided forms, documentation and templates help accountants update assets without writing code.

items.title: Do you support custom depreciation methods?
items.description: Alongside MACRS we support straight line, declining balance and custom overrides with audit tracking.

items.title: How accurate are the calculations?
items.description: We use IRS tables, mid quarter tests and rounding guidance that mirror Form 4562 instructions. Automated tests cover every property class.

items.title: Is there onboarding help?
